title: Gebug Ende Ritual Experience (Half-day)
overview: Witness the traditional Gebug Ende ritual, a unique whip-fighting ceremony in Bali.

stops.description: Arrive and observe the Gebug Ende ritual and learn about its significance.

title: Gebug Ende Ritual & Village Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring the Gebug Ende ritual and the surrounding village culture.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Gebug Ende ritual.
Tour the local village and interact with the community.
Participate in a workshop or discussion about Balinese rituals.
